setEffects.4: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

flower.name: Scholar's Bookmark
flower.desc: A dried flower used as a bookmark. It has absorbed the scent from the pages.

plume.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
plume.desc: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen. The tip has long been stained black.

sands.name: Scholar's Clock
sands.desc: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

goblet.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
goblet.desc: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

circlet.name: Scholar's Lens
circlet.desc: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.
